diffpy.mpdf.tests package¶

Submodules¶

diffpy.mpdf.tests.run module¶

Convenience module for executing all unit tests with python -m diffpy.mpdf.tests.run

Module contents¶

Unit tests for diffpy.mpdf.

diffpy.mpdf.tests.test()[source]¶

Execute all unit tests for the diffpy.mpdf package. Return a unittest TestResult object.

diffpy.mpdf.tests.testsuite()[source]¶

Build a unit tests suite for the diffpy.mpdf package. Return a unittest.TestSuite object.
